Old-timey Surrealist Gifs by Kevin Weir

Posted on November 30, 2014 by Emi T

Hello lovelies.  Today, I thought it was time for something delightfully strange.  I ran across these awesome surreal gifs on Tumblr, thanks to paqosdragons, and thought I’d share them here.  Artist Kevin Weir makes these wonderful gifs from old photographs he gets from the library of congress.  Now this is exactly why I love royalty free archives.  It opens up a world of endless possibilities for really clever and strange delights.

Do you like my top picks?  Check out more of Kevin Weir’s artwork on his main site and his Tumblr blog.  Don’t forget to share your favorites!

Posted in Picture Day Tagged animated gif, art, artwork, clever gif, Clockwork Twist, CWTwist, Emily Thompson, kevin weir, neo-Victorian, old photographs, old photos, surreal, victoriana Leave a comment

Picture Day: Bjorn Hurri’s Steampunk Star Wars.

Posted on March 2, 2014 by

There’s a lot of Steampunk Star Wars images and sculptures out there.  I’ve seen some fun cosplay too.  Today I’m going to treat you to my favorite version, with the art of Bjorn Hurri.  Click any image for enlargements and source pages.

      

      

      

What’s your favorite version of Steampunk Star Wars?  Drop a link or an image (site the artist if you can, please) down in the comments!

And may the steam be with you.

Click images for more of each.

Picture Day: Shiny new Trick cover design!

Posted on November 3, 2013 by

Are you excited for the next book in the CWTwist series?  Of course you are!  The release of Clockwork Twist, Book Two, Trick is swiftly approaching!

Take a gander at the first draft of the new cover design.   I’ve been working on this for many a week, but I think it’s getting there, and looking pretty snazzy.

Click to see the huge, high-quality version of these images.  Here’s a close up of the front cover, as well.

Well, internet?  What do you think?  I want to hear your thoughts.  Leave me a comment with some feedback.!

And while you’re at it, check out the quick description of the plot!

And don’t forget to keep an eye out for the preview first chapters.  I’ll start posting them here on this blog in mid December, leading up to the official release in January!  Oh, I’m so excited!

Picture day: Evgeny Kornienko’s photography

Posted on September 2, 2013 by

Today’s fantastic images come from Evgeny Kornienko, a photographer from Belgorod Russia.  Feast your eyes!  Click for a full view.


   Aren’t those lovely?  You can find more from this photographer at his photodom.com site or his Facebook.  I’d love to tell you something about this artist, but … well, I can’t read Russian and I don’t trust Google Translate.  Still, you know what they say about pictures speaking 1000 words and all.

Picture Day : Insect Lab (Ooo…buy me one!!!)

Posted on August 5, 2013 by

Happy August, internet!  Today’s image dump of awesome comes from Insect Lab Studio, one of the coolest/creepiest sites I’ve found.  These wonderful little sculptures are for sale on the site, so by the time this post is up some of these might already be sold.  Get ‘um while they’re hot!  Enjoy!
